body.name: Blackhead Remover Mask: 80g Black Head Remover for Face - Peel Off Face Mask - Facial Masks for Women & Men Skin Care - Charcoal Pore Deep Cleansing Mask - Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 45 mins
features: 【DEEP CLEASING OF IDEAL GIFT】- Blackhead Removal Mask is formulated specifically for removing blackheads fast and effectively, Visibly reducing wrinkles and fine lines, Improving dermal density. An ideal gift for your spouse, parents, friends and all you loved.

【ACTIVATED CHARCOAL】- Face mask skin care, A deep pore cleaner, this activated black charcoal face mask helps remove impurities, blackheads, and blemishes for toned and radiant skin. The ingenious formula is packed with vitamins, nutrients, and extracts that will improve your skin health.
【PAINLESS & EASY TO USE 】- This newest Blackhead Remover Mask is formulated with active ingredients that allows you to painlessly remove unwanted blackheads from your skin.

【TIGHTEN PORES】- Our upgraded formula peel-off-mask has unique strong absorption qualities and deep cleaning functions, which can remove stubborn stains and oil spots on face, resulting in smaller pores after single use.

【100% SATISFACTION】 - Please assure that we always stand behind our blackhead peel off mask. Should you for any reason be unhappy with your purchase, we provide you excellent customer support, please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to resolve your issues.
body.description: Direction:Step 1. Clean your skin with warm water to remove dead skin cells and open the skin pores. Then apply the blackhead remover mask on your face (avoiding the eyebrows, eyes and lips). Create a thick layer with Silicone Brush.Step 2. Leave for around 15 minutes to dry completely.Step 3. Gently peel off the black mask. If you have quite a lot of blackheads or small hairs, it may hurt. But keep the wonderful result in mind – soft, smooth blackhead-free skin you will get.Step 4. For best results, finish with Toner to tighten the pores.Caution:1. Keep out of reach of children.2. For external use only. If redness or irritation occurs, discontinue use.3. Don’t use it on your acne or inflamed areas.4. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.Tip:Some may find the mask too watery, and it's dripping even after a long time waiting. The reason is that the mask contains very moisturizing ingredients to prevent dry skin. Please apply a thin layer onto the face first, and add another layer if needed.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,296 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #15 in Facial Masks

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1 Cleanse your skin and use a hot towel to place on the areas with open pores or blackheads for 3-5 minutes. 2 To properly use this product, apply an even thin layer on the face, avoiding direct contact with the eyes, brows, and lips, particularly on areas with blackheads and the nose. 3 Wait for the mask to dry for approximately 10-15 minutes. 4 Peel off the mask and use warm water to cleanse the face, and if possible, use a toner to shrink pores. Follow up with your usual skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical at first, but after using this for a couple weeks now. I notice a difference, it peels off good, pulls blackheads out and leaves your skin feeling soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was always a little hesitant with these peel off masks and whether they actually worked or if they just hurt your skin while leaving everything behind. I wanted a deep clean for my face so I decided to give this product a try. After applying, I was surprised how fast it dried and how easy it was to peel off! It didn't hurt at all and it left me feeling really refreshed. Not to mention this is really affordable and you can spread the mask liquid in every crevice and corner to get everything out. I recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy the cooling sensation as you apply and it is drying. It is easy to remove and if you accidentally get some on a sensitive spot or your eyebrows it washes off with warm water! Adding this to my weekly face routine as a regular for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I found this product very easy to use and it was most effective in reducing the enlarged pores on my nose. I certainly plan to continue using it and expect to receive excellent results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good facial mask
reviews.reviewText: I like this product. Easy to apply comes off easy. Great for my oily skin. Removes blackheads and leave skin feeling clean and smooth.y

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised!
reviews.reviewText: It was super easy to apply and then peeled off beautifully! I will definitely be buying again! I’ve used it a few times and my skin feels amazing!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It worked great on my skin. I felt so refreshed and rejuvenated after and during use. It goes smoothly. The only problem I had was how liquidy it was. It is a bit messy, but worth it nonetheless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is really easy to use and apply. It has a nice cooling effect, and was not irritating to my skin. It's a very good product and at a good price
